name: Only Allow Administrators
author: Sumon Hasan

sections.description:
Only Allow Administrators is a simple and useful plugin. Without Administrators user, nobody can’t log in your WordPress dashboard.

Demo

Go here for more details
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do you have any question regarding the plugin usage? You can ask me questions in My Support Forum

How to install and activate the plugin?

Installing and activating the Only Allow Administrators is as easy as other plugins in the plugins repository. See Installation section.

How to use the Plugin?

See Description section.
